name: @domoinc/domo-phoenix
description: Build beautiful charts using Domo's powerful charting engine

scripts.copy:phoenix: npm run create:lib && cp ./src/lib/phoenix.js ./build/main/lib/phoenix.js && cp ./src/lib/phoenix.js ./build/module/lib/phoenix.js && cp ./src/lib/phoenix.js ./build/amd/lib/phoenix.js
scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run build:main && npm run build:module && npm run build:amd && npm run copy:phoenix
